thread.title: Trump Administration Proposes Rule Calling for Stabilizing Market Under ACA - WSJ
thread.title_full: Trump Administration Proposes Rule Calling for Stabilizing Market Under ACA - WSJ

author: Stephanie Armour
title: Trump Administration Proposes Rule Calling for Stabilizing Market Under ACA - WSJ
text:
Trump Administration Proposes Rule Calling for Stabilizing Market Under ACA Rule being considered by White House Office of Management and Budget By @stepharmour1 Feb. 2, 2017 4:24 p.m. ET 
The Department of Health and Human Services has proposed a rule that calls for stabilizing the insurance market under the Affordable Care Act. 
Other than the title of the rule submitted to the White House Office of Management and Budget on Wednesday, “Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act; Market Stabilization,” no other details were available. But Republicans in Congress have been looking to shore up the health law in the short... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
